2453.TW.summary: Syscom Computer Engineering Co. provides information technology services worldwide. It offers services in the areas of system integration, online custom information integration, e-business, high-tech manufacturing, network planning and implementation, outsourcing, hardware sales and maintenance, software development and maintenance, and training. The company's industry-specific solutions include planning, integration, deployment, and maintenance services; networking; electronic transaction real-time risk management systems; banking and securities trading platforms; healthcare information solutions; telecom infrastructure; and value-added telecom services. Its industry-specific solutions also comprise real-time transit system management; eGovernment; public sector unified portal platforms; information security; office automation; data warehouse outsourcing; computer center facilities management; database design; and Internet database application design services. The company offers its solutions for financial institutions, high-tech manufacturers, public sector, securities companies, healthcare and medical industries, telecommunications, and educational institutions. Syscom Computer Engineering Co. was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3147.TWO.summary: Jetwell Computer Co., Ltd. provides IT infrastructure and integration services in Taiwan. The company offers computer system products, including servers, workstations, notebooks, pads, and printer systems; and storage and big data integration services, as well as designs, builds, integrates, and sells thin client systems. It also provides network products, such as firewall and intrusion detection systems, building green IDC, switch hubs, routers, network interface cards, and wireless network products, as well as international system management and planning and digital surveillance systems. In addition, the company offers security software, file and database audit software, anti-virus, anti-hacker, SPAM, VM ware, and back-up software; building private cloud; and BYOD solutions, as well as integrates and sells encrypting file system and file management software. Further, it provides various professional services comprising maintenance contract, on-site maintenance, IT consultation, project management, and cloud rental and security services. Jetwell Computer Co., Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

4953.TWO.summary: Wistron Information Technology & Services Corporation operates as an information technology (IT) service provider to Fortune 500 companies worldwide. It provides R&D as a service, which include talents outsourcing consultancy, research and production service, and team building service; software development, testing, and operation and maintenance services; and business process outsourcing services. The company also offers product globalization services; and software localization, localization testing, translation, and desktop publishing services. In addition, it provides cloud service, mobile, mobile payment, enterprise resource planning, and SmartRobot solutions; data warehousing/big data implementation and consulting, and Internet advertising data analysis services; application management services. The company serves banking, insurance, telecom, automobile, healthcare, retail, and manufacturing industries. Wistron Information Technology & Services Corporation was founded in 1992 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5209.TWO.summary: CTCI Advanced Systems Inc. provides system integration services to the hydrocarbon, power, industry, transportation, and high technology markets in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides main automation contractor services in the areas of project planning, design, procurement, installation, test, commissioning, start up, and running or turnkey projects. It also offers railway electrical and mechanical (E&M) solutions, such as signaling, telecommunications, SCADA, and related information system solutions; airport and satellite E&M services for airport terminal, airfield runway, and satellite industries; and hi-tech plant E&M services for wafer, electro-optical, display glass, or bio-tech plants. In addition, the company provides process simulation and IT systems, including process optimization, energy saving and waste reduction, facility reliability, and plant safety and emergency planning products and services, as well as distributes and maintains SmartPlant P&ID intelligent solutions, plant EPC projects engineering information management solutions, and visualize plant's engineering information management solutions. Further, it offers smart water network platform integrated with GIS to manage and monitor water network; cyber security software for detecting the abnormal signs caused by equipment malfunction, operational mistake, and cyber-attack; construction safety management platform; and rotary machine predictive maintenance platform to collect sound and vibration data of rotary machines, and build baseline models to analyze machine condition. Additionally, the company distributes NovaTech D/3 DCS and batch control management systems; Intergraph Process, Power & Marine - PP&M products and solutions; AspenTech process optimization software; and Mr. Energy 50001, an energy information management system platform. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6112.TW.summary: SYSAGE Technology Co., Ltd. provides ICT solutions in Taiwan. The company offers planning and system integration services for corporate network establishment, network system security, network management, and data processing analysis and backup system; and provides related technical consultation, and education and training courses, as well as professional services, such as corporate networks solutions, as well as develops professional application software solutions. It also provides network and system software and hardware products from Cisco, Oracle, and IBM; develops solutions for agent products; and plans the network hardware architecture, host system, network security mechanism, database, and related enterprise application software for customers. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6214.TW.summary: Systex Corporation provides various IT services for enterprise and government clients in Taiwan and Asia. It operates through Financial Business Integration, Customer Market Integration, Data Technology Integration, China Group, and Investment Department segments. The Financial Business Integration segment provides financial technologies and develops smart finance, centered on FinTech to assist financial customers in digital transformation, including transformation services in mobile applications, integration services for investor, and wealth management upgrade services. The Customer Market Integration segment offers full-channel and full payment services, and assists customers in operating O2O business to realize digital transformation. The Data Technology Integration segment provides comprehensive data technology products and solutions to drive business intelligence growth of customers, acts as the data enabler for customers, and introduces digital technology to provide solutions to customer in digital transformation. The China Group segment offers system integration and value-added services, as well as commercial software and cloud platform tools. The Investment Department segment engages in the investment activities. The company is also involved in the sale and leasing of computer software and related equipment; design of computer system; transmission and security of value-added network; maintenance of database; and consultation and repair services. In addition, it engages in general investment, computer room installation, and communication engineering services; manufacture and sale of wire communication equipment and apparatus, and electronic parts and components; and wholesale and retail of computer and business machinery equipment. Systex Corporation was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

8099.TWO.summary: Tatung System Technologies Inc. provides professional services and assistance in digital transformation. The company provides services, including intelligent solutions, consultancy services, cloud services, information and communication system integration and construction, protection of data security, and uninterrupted services, as well as AI medical image recognition system for mammography and smart medical services. It serves customers in a range of industries, such as telecommunication, financial holdings, manufacturing, media, retail, government, military, universities, and research organizations. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.
